test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y bed))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl: The refrigerator is closed. The microwave is opened. The white remotecontrol which is white is in the washmachine. Put the can on the bed. Put the white book in the cupboard. Take out the white remotecontrol from washmachine. Put the remotecontrol which is black in the cupboard. Put the green book on desk.
